title: is this what i think it means :D?
body: So recently I was in my series for my promotion and I lost them :(. after I lost my game I got a tab or a pop up in the game stats screen, it wrote something along these lines: "You have been unsuccessful in completing your series, Next time you enter your series you get a free win" so do I actually get a free win the next time I enter my promos? Cause I have never seen that before where you get a free win. Can someone clarify if that's true? Thanks

replies.body:
hey proMINscuous!

Yep that's right. This season we introduced Promo Helper. Check out this Season 2016 page:

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/ranked-improvements.html

Scroll down to Promo helper :)
